title: Power Outage Expected
message: Massive power outages are expected due to line maintenance and scattered thunderstorms this weekend. Residents are encouraged to prepare.

title: Boil Water Advisory
message: A citywide boil water advisory has been issued due to a main break near downtown Anderson.

title: Library Hours Update
message: The McDonald County Library will be closing an hour early this Friday for staff development.

title: Farmers Market This Weekend
message: Don't forget to stop by the farmers market at the square Saturday morning for fresh produce and local crafts!

title: Road Construction on Hwy 76
message: Expect delays on Hwy 76 near Tiff City as resurfacing work continues through the end of next week.

title: Chamber Meeting
message: There will be a Chamber Meeting at the community center Saturday starting at 10:00am.

title: T-Ball Game Delay
message: Farmers market will cause Saturday's T-Ball game for the Pineville Tornadoes to be delayed to accommodate facilities.

title: Exit Closed on 49
message: Closed southbound exit 7 on 49, find alternate route
